How many mods do you have installed? If you have many mods installed, you should delete the parts that you don't use and/or set the game to "half-res" in the settings menu.

I already use Half-Res and i had 3 mods

I scaled down anti alising and Scatter density it should work fine now

and i deleted memory eating program now stock is with no lag try mods now bye!

Is anyone else having problems with the Buran and Kliper being very sensitive to controls? They also act like they still have the old ASAS system, shaking themselves to bits when it's applied.

Edited November 22, 2013 by Exovian

Is anyone else having problems with the Buran and Kliper being very sensitive to controls? They also act like they still have the old ASAS system, shaking themselves to bits when it's applied.

Dont use the Kliper myself so cant say there, but the current release version of the Buran is probably the best flying version to date imo.
It certainly has good flight handling, but whenever I try to hold position, the flaps start flailing around like crazy.
This was not a planed shot, so my graphics are turned down...but thought it looked good so figured Id share =)
